name: simple-db-viewer
description: Simple database viewer for PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and MongoDB

scripts.start: echo "Visualizer disabled by default. Use START_DB_VISUALIZER=1 with db_visualizer_start_optional.sh" && exit 0
scripts.dev: echo "Visualizer dev disabled. Use START_DB_VISUALIZER=1 with db_visualizer_start_optional.sh" && exit 0
scripts.start:optional: node -e "try{require.resolve('express');process.exit(0)}catch(e){process.exit(1)}" && node server.js --host 0.0.0.0 || echo 'Skipping visualizer start (express not installed)'
